intro.name: Hello, I'm Flo!
intro.title: Fullstack developer based in Paris
intro.details: Passionate about web development, code is an integral part of my daily life at work or in my personal projects. Having a keen interest in communication, I adapt quickly to new environments and I enjoy working in a team; designing and implementing clean, scalable code is what drives me as a developer.
intro.media: Reach me on Linkedin, Github or Malt!
